text: Jean-Baptiste Colbert was a French statesman who served as Minister of State from 1661 until his death in 1683. ==Other websites== * *Histoire de la vie et de l'administration de Colbert by Jean-Pierre Cl√©ment *Jean-Baptiste Colbert Correspondence Kislak Center for Special Collections, Rare Books and Manuscripts, University of Pennsylvania * * Category:French economists Category:French Roman Catholics Category:Government ministers of France Category:1619 births Category:1683 deaths Category:People from Reims Category:French businesspeople
title: Jean-Baptiste Colbert
